com.github.pwittchen.reactivebeacons.library

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pwittchen.reactivebeacons.library.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static filtering methods, which can be used with RxJava filter(...) method inside specific subscription. These methods can be used for filtering Proximity, distance, device names and MAC addresses.
